file_content.text: Stay back! I've taken your friends hostage. Anything happens to me and they're dead!
This is Minister Lorman. Let me speak to the prisoners.
Oh, hello, Lorman.
This is who you sent to capture us? I'm a little offended.
Sounds like you had some excitement on your end.
Eventful day?
It's good to hear your voice.
I knew you weren't dead. Never doubted it for a second.
Saresh is behind this. Has she attempted to reach you?
We need to stop Saresh.
Saresh wants the Alliance, Commander. She's on Odessen as we speak.
Hold tight. I'm on my way.
You are my guest, Outlander. Would you like to execute the traitor or should I?
I've got a better idea. Slap a shock collar on him. Let others see what happens when they oppose you.
Make him a slave.
That is a truly excellent plan.
It's time to embrace new methods, Empress. Be merciful and you'll have a loyal servant for life.
Let him go.
I say we kill him together.
Why not both?
Unsatisfying, but I will try it your way.
I fully agree.
She's done more than that.
I couldn't leave the Alliance in the hands of you two, could I?
And leave you alone? Never.
Saresh tried to kill me. It's time to repay the favor.
I'm destroying Saresh.
I'm glad you're both safe.
What a relief.
You started the killing without me.
I missed all the fun.
It's not us you should be worried about.
Promise you'll let me watch.
You were worried about me.
[Flirt] Miss me?
I, uh... Let's focus on the chancellor.
I was ready to hunt you down myself.
You need to stop doing this to me.
Charging through the jungle to rescue me? How romantic.
[Flirt] How sweet of you.
Don't forget the part where I wring the chancellor's neck.
Nothing we couldn't handle.
We can't let you have all the fun.
You gave us quite a scare.
You are my guest. Would you like to execute the traitor or should I?
